name: Baby lost in A Pet Store
name_original: Baby lost in A Pet Store
description:
A little part of this game I'm making in Bitsy Game Maker. I have no clue where this is going I just got bored and put whatever was in my mind into this game. Will probobly complete in the future. Also, the baby has a top hat. Don't question it. 

Update: There is now a cashier and a way to win
